events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for days and I'm worried about the delay.
The system identified the issue as a delivery delay based on customer report mentioning tracking and late shipment.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this delivery delay case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order is delayed and I'll do my best to assist you today.
Could you please provide your order number and any recent tracking updates you have so I can check with the shipping carrier?
My order number is 123456789. The last tracking update was four days ago and it just says 'In transit' with no new location.
I've contacted the shipping company to get a status update on your package and expect their response within 24 hours. I'll keep you updated.
Thanks for looking into this quickly. I appreciate you keeping me informed while you check with the shipping provider.
Since the package is still delayed and the shipping company hasn't provided an update, we're escalating this issue to our logistics team for urgent review.
Good news! We've located your shipment and confirmed it will arrive within the next two days. We're sorry for the inconvenience caused by the delay.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your package. Please let us know if everything is okay or if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday and everything is in perfect condition. Thank you for resolving this issue promptly!
We are closing your case now since your delivery issue is resolved. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime.
We have sent you a survey to rate your customer support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
